channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: North Carolina’s historically Black colleges are mobilizing for Nov. 5, tapping an activist history
item.description: North Carolina’s 10 historically Black colleges are going all out to get their nearly 40,000 students to vote.

item.title: House fire in north Chicago suburb leaves 3 people dead and another hospitalized
item.description: Authorities say a house fire killed three people and injured a fourth person in a north Chicago suburb.

item.title: AP PHOTOS: Emptiness sculpts everything from daily life to politics on Arizona’s Navajo Nation
item.description: Emptiness paints the vast ranges and rugged mountains of Arizona’s 22 Native reservations, sculpting daily life, culture and even politics in nearly a quarter of the state.
